Layer.showParentHint

Function/Meaning
Whether to inherit the parent layer's hint
Type
Layer class property (read/write)
Description
Represents whether to inherit the parent layer's hint. You can also set the value.
If true, if the Layer.hint property is an empty string, it searches up the parent layers and inherits and displays the hint of the first layer found that has a hint set. If the Layer.hint property is not an empty string, it displays that instead.
If false, it displays the Layer.hint property if it is not an empty string, and displays no hint if it is an empty string.
